titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: under dep. ref = no idea, "Diane"? Feb 25 = "Ropes"? whole title could be wrong s2: Nov 7 = "Duuthways"? Nov 30 = currency symbol, looks most like "m" though s4: April 1st = return date blotted out April 10 = second part of title blotted April 28 = "Connhies"? May 5 = "aliens grassor"?

body.ab:
de Jessey Mme. 1938 5. Place du Palais Bourbon.
1 m. 1 v. 50 dep. ref. Mar 1st 50 Thierry.
Feb 11 Seven Pillars of Wisdom. Febr 16 16 Keep the Aspidistra Flying Feb 19 Feb 19 Best Short Stories Feb. 24 24 Thieves like us Febr. 25 25 Due Life Due Feb 26 26 This Must be the Place Febr. 28 28 Burmese Days. March 2 March 2. Absalom Absalom 2 Soldier's Pay March 7 7 These Foolish Things March 8 8 Death In the Afternoon March 14 14 Milarepa March 17 Renewed March 11 - April 11 - 1 vol 17 Burning Cactus March 19 19 Pie In the Sky March 28 28 Ends & Means April 6 April 6 Rains Came Apr 25 Renewed April 11 - May 11 1938 1v 50v 25 Constance Mackiewicz May 2 May 2 Ulysses May 2 Renewed May 11 - June 11 13 1938 50v May 21 Dead Center May 24 24 Unvanquished May 24 28 Northwest Passage June 2
June 2_ Fight for Life June 15 June 15 Living China June 20 Renewed June 11 - July 11 1938 50v June 20 Anthony Adverse June 23 23 Light in August June 29 29 Those were the Days July 4 July 4 My Country + My People July 11 Renewed July 11 one month 50 francs July 11 Let Your Mind Alone July 13 " 13 Imperial City July 18 " 18 Three GUINEAS July 23 July 18 23 the SISBB July 28 Left July 28th ; will take up subscription again (+ the 11 days left on this subscription) @ Oct 1st. Oct 19 Journeys Between Wars Oct 24 Oct 24 Boundary Against Night Oct 27 Oct 27 New Directions Oct 31 Renewed Oct 31st 6m 1 vol 180 frs - April 30
Oct 31st Gay and Melancholy Flux Nov 7 Nov 7 Nov 10 Nov 10 Imperial City Nov 15 Nov 15 Daring Young Man Nov 19 Nov 19 Little Children Nov 24 Nov 24 White Mule Nov 26 Nov 26 Long Valley Nov 30 Nov 30 Seven Against Reeves no fine Dec 15 " They Seek a Country 1 per day. Dec 15 paid Dec 15 Dec 15 Blessington d'Orsay Jan 23 Jan 23 Of Human Bondage Jan 30 30 Rebecca Feb 6 6 Boundary Against Night
1939 TO May 1st DE JESSEY Feb 8 Those Were the Days Feb 13 13 My Sister Eileen Feb 16 16 Arthur Rimbaud 21 21 Do What You Will 27 27 Fifth Column Mar 1 1 Jungle of the Mind Mar 13 13 Benjamin Franklin March 16 16 Midas touch March 18 18 Lillian Wald Mar 22 22 Trio Mar 24 24 Wild Palms Mar 31 31 Young Man with a Horn Apr 5 Apr 5 Destructive Element Apr 17 17 Christmas Holiday Apr 19 19 Flashing Stream Apr 21 21 At Swim 2 Binds Apr 24 24 Unbroken Heart Apr 28 28 Midas Touch May 1 3m 1 vol B Jan 28 - April 28 95 will give D. 100. next time pd dep 50 Jan 31 Jan 28 Hamlet Jan 31 31 No Mean City Crazy Hunter Feb 3 Feb 3 Other Gods Feb 10 Feb 10 White Horses of Vienna Feb 14 14 Death of a Man Feb 18 18 Fifth Column Feb 24 24 Native Son Feb 28 28 Men without Women Mar 6 Mar 6 Seven poor men of Sidney Mar 11 Adrigoole 11 Mar 11 Salzburger Tales March 25 11 Knife March 25 25 Night of the Poor Mar. 27
de JESSEY To July 28 1941 Mar 27 New Gentleman Please April 1 April 1st Letters to Frederick Tennyson 1st Power & the Glory 60 April 10 Single April 21 Joyce (Gorman) April 21 April 21 Backward Son April 24 21 Crock of Gold Ap 24 24 Trouble in July Apr 28 28 Coming up for air May 5 28 In all 5 May 5 Patriot May 16 5 Way of May 16 May 16 Green Hills of Africa May 26 May 16 As I Lay Dying 26 Renewed April 28 (pd May 16) July 28 1941 2 vols A 100v May 26 May 16 My next Bride June 3 26 Gentlemen I address you privately June 3 June 3 Coming Sir June 11 June 3 Best Short Stories of 1938 Eng-Am June 11 June 11 Portrait of Jennie June 18 11 Blaze of Noon June 18 18 Ulysses July 4 18 Pitch Lake July 4 July 4 Party Going July 15 July 4 Young Manhood of Studs Lonnigan July 15 July 15 Fellow Countryman Sept 2 July 15 Story of a lake Sept 2 will renew later Left Dep_
